document.topic_text: Papa Gio's, 109-J Old Chapin Rd., Lexington- 97 A Ten Ten Restaurant, 2000 Clemson Rd., #1 Columbia- 96 A Low Scores: Restaurant 44, 2120 Pond Branch Rd., Gilbert- 72 C Rodent droppings in the bread storage Raw sausage stored over ready to eat chicken salad in the reach-in-cooler Grease and grime buildup in the cook-line, mop sink Follow-up: August 15 Angelo's, 2895 Main St., Newberry- 78 B Roaches in their stove and hand-sink Food debris in the dish machine, under microwaves and floors Follow-up: August 18 Granary/Sims Companies, 1539 Horseshoe Dr., Columbia- 80 B Raw chicken thawing in standing water above 70 degrees F Follow-up: August 15 Private Property, 220 W Main St., Lexington- 100 A Casual Pint, 807 Gervais St., Columbia- 100 A Wolf Pizza, 322 Little Brook Ln., West Columbia- 100 A Golden Spatula winner: Jackie Hite's Bar-B-Que %
